mistral.reason: The film 'The Killing Fields' is not an English movie. It was produced by a British production company, but the primary language used throughout the film is Khmer, reflecting the Cambodian setting of the story.

llama3.1.reason: The film was shot on location in Thailand (and Canada) which implies that the dialogue and soundtrack would likely be English, but there's no mention of subtitles or non-English language usage in any of the provided context.
